Ivo Perelman.title: Serendipity
Ivo Perelman.about:
Recorded, mixed and mastered by Jim Clouse at Park West Studios, Brooklyn, NY, November 2011

Produced by Ivo Perelman & Leo Feigin



This was originally supposed to be a date with Matthew Shipp and Gerald Cleaver (that eventually took place a week later and was released as The Foreign Legion). One of the musicians was late and couldn't reach us at the studio so William Parker was called. By the time he got to the recording the missing musician showed up as well and it became a quartet date. Serendipity indeed, as the music here shows. — Ivo Perelman
Ivo Perelman.credits:
released May 2, 2025
            
            Ivo Perelman - tenor saxophone

Matthew Shipp - piano

William Parker - bass

Gerald Cleaver - drums
